title: Collections
description: Groups of `items` and/or `elements`. Collections MUST have a parent wrapper surrounding one or many `items` and/or `elements`.

sections.title: Boxes
description: MUST extend the `%box` placeholder. Boxes MUST use at least one child box element.

sections.title: Button Groups
description: MUST be a wrapper containing `items` that extend `%btn`

sections.title: Dropdowns
description: MUST be a wrapper containing an `item` that extends `%btn`, a list element, and an `arrow`

sections.title: List Groups
description: MUST be an augmented list or list of links. Wrapper MUST NOT contain `items` that extend %btn, button groups should be used for that.

sections.title: Form Groups
description: Alternatives to fieldsets. Submit buttons/inputs SHOULD use classes that extend `%btn` instead of being styled directly.
